snippet: Anne M. Sweeney, one of the most powerful women in the entertainment industry, will leave in 2015 after 18 years at the company to become a television director.
abstract: Anne M Sweeney, one of the most powerful women in entertainment industry, announces that she will step down as president of Disney-ABC Television Group in 2015, after 18 years at the company, to become a television director; move, which Disney executives and Sweeney emphasize was a voluntary decision, stuns Hollywood.

byline.original: By BROOKS BARNES and BILL CARTER
byline.contributor: Brooks Barnes reported from Los Angeles and Bill Carter from New York.

lead_paragraph: Anne M. Sweeney, one of the most powerful women in the entertainment industry, will leave in 2015 after 18 years at the company to become a television director.

headline.main: Top Disney TV Official to Step Down
headline.print_headline: Top Disney TV Official to Step Down
